title: Introduction to Juris Framework
subtitle: A revolutionary approach to web development
categorySubtitle: Learn the basics of Juris Framework
content:
What is Juris Framework?

Juris is a revolutionary JavaScript framework that brings unprecedented flexibility to web development through its Object DOM architecture and reactive state management system.

Key Features

  • Zero Race Conditions: Automatic dependency tracking eliminates timing issues
  • Temporal Independence: Components and data can load in any order
  • Headless Components: Separate business logic from UI completely
